def_cn: 人为的;虚假的;捏造的;矫揉造作的
def_en: If you say that something someone says or does is contrived, you think it is false and deliberate, rather than natural and not planned.

def_cn: (戏剧、电影、小说等)虚构的，不足信的，不真实的
def_en: If you say that the plot of a play, film, or novel is contrived, you mean that it is unlikely and unconvincing.
